vendor_id.description: The vendor ID as per RFC 2865/2866.

domain_types.description: The list of domains applicable to AVP.

user_defined.description: Determines if AVP was defined by user.

is_restricted.description: Determines if AVP is restricted to domains.

vendor_type.description: The vendor type as per RFC 2865/2866.

type.description: The type of AVP as per RFC 2865/2866.

subscriber_id.description: The name of AVP to be used as a subscriber.

pc_zone_name.description: The SOA to store parental control records.

proxy_password.description: Proxy server password used for authentication.

cat_password.description: Category content account password to access the categorization service.

local_id_subexpression.description: The subexpression indicates which subexpression to extract. If zero, then the text matching the entire regular expression is extracted. If non-zero, then the regex must contain at least that many sub-expression groups. It takes values from 0 to 8.

cat_acctname.description: Category content account name using the categorization service.

ip_space_disc_regexp.description: A character string to control aspects of rewriting of the fields.

ancillaries.description: The list of ordered AVP Ancillary Fields.

ip_space_discriminator.description: The name of AVP to be used as IP address discriminator.

alt_subscriber_id_regexp.description: A character string to control aspects of rewriting of the fields.

ip_anchors.description: The ordered list of IP Anchors AVPs. The list content cannot be changed, but the order of elements.

local_id_regexp.description: A character string to control aspects of rewriting of the fields.

interim_accounting_interval.description: The time for collector to be fully populated. Valid values are from 1 to 65535.

enable_parental_control.description: Determines if parental control is enabled.

alt_subscriber_id_subexpression.description: The subexpression indicates which subexpression to extract. If zero, then the text matching the entire regular expression is extracted. If non-zero, then the regex must contain at least that many sub-expression groups. It takes values from 0 to 8.

subscriber_id_regexp.description: A character string to control aspects of rewriting of the fields.

cat_update_frequency.description: Category content updates every number of hours.

enable_mgmt_only_nas.description: Determines if NAS RADIUS traffic is accepted over MGMT only.

subscriber_id_subexpression.description: The subexpression indicates which subexpression to extract. If zero, then the text matching the entire regular expression is extracted. If non-zero, then the regex must contain at least that many sub-expression groups. It takes values from 0 to 8.

ident.description: Category content authorization string per customer for remote RD lookup and category access.

log_guest_lookups.description: CEF log all guest lookups, will produce two logs in case of a violation.

proxy_url.description: Proxy url to download category data from and upload feedback to, configure for parental control. The default value 'None' is no longer valid as it match url regex pattern ^http|https://. The new default value does not get saved in database, but rather used for comparision with object created in unit test cases.

local_id.description: The name of AVP to be used as local ID.

proxy_username.description: Proxy server username used for authentication.

category_url.description: Category content vendor url to download category data from and upload feedback to, configure for parental control.

alt_subscriber_id.description: The name of AVP to be used as an alternate subscriber ID for fixed lines.

ip_space_disc_subexpression.description: The subexpression indicates which subexpression to extract. If zero, then the text matching the entire regular expression is extracted. If non-zero, then the regex must contain at least that many sub-expression groups. It takes values from 0 to 8.

name.description: The name of the blocking policy.

value.description: The 32 bit hex value of the blocking policy.

comment.description: The human readable comment for the site.

blocking_ipv4_vip1.description: The IPv4 Address of the blocking server.

blocking_ipv4_vip2.description: The IPv4 Address of the blocking server.

abss.description: The list of ABS for the site.

maximum_subscribers.description: The max number of subscribers for the site. It is used to configure the cache size.

strict_nat.description: Restrict subscriber cache entries to NATed clients.

msps.description: The list of MSP for the site.

nas_port.description: The port number to reach the collector.

first_port.description: The start of the first Deterministic block.

members.description: The list of members for the site.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

nas_gateways.description: The list of accounting log servers.

block_size.description: The size of the Deterministic NAT block-size.

blocking_ipv6_vip2.description: The IPv6 Address of the blocking server.

blocking_ipv6_vip1.description: The IPv6 Address of the blocking server.

spms.description: The list of SPM for the site.

name.description: The name of the IP space discriminator.

value.description: The value of the IP space discriminator.
